description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 課程重點：(1)藉由適合其程度的教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2)使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式；(4)透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
description.en: This course is designed (1) to strengthen students' previously required knowledge in English with basic grammatical ideas and sentence patterns reviewed through reading materials appropriate to their levels; (2) to develop reading skill by giving explanation of difficult words, phrases, and syntax, as well as analysis of basic writing skill; (3)to  familiarize students with useful expressions in conversation and build up their confidence in cross-cultural communication; (4)to reinforce the competence and performance of listening, speaking, reading and writing by practice.

description.zh: 國文，是運用本國語言文字，蘊釀於欣賞文藝作品，充實文化內涵，增進思維能力與人文素養的一門課程。本課程分為大一上學期2學分，大一下學期2學分。大一上學期的授課內容，以文學名篇為範圍；希望藉此擴建學生深入品味文學趣味的能力，鍛鍊靈活的語文敏感度，默契文學創意，甚而嘗試創作。大一下學期的授課內容，以思想名篇為範圍；希望藉此啟發學生透轍分析各家學說思想，漫步哲人的宇宙天地，跟隨哲人的心路歷程，進而念茲在茲，從容內化，共饗取之不盡用之不竭的先驗與風範。
description.en: "Chinese" is the course where we make full use of our native languages to enjoy literary works, to enrich our cultural taste, to develop our thinking and even to elevate human cultivation.This four-credit course is set for the freshman students: with 2 credits in each of the two semesters of the school year. In the first semester, the course covers important articles in literature, in the hope for the student learners to cultivate better ability to taste literary works when they have more vivid sense on the language. With fuller knowledge on what literature is about, they are expected to try creative writings. For the second semester, the course is mainly focused on the writings on thoughts. description.zh: 本校之普通物理課程專為工程科系背景之同學設計，主要的目的是鼓勵同學參與大自然運行奧秘、法則之探索，並供給爾後修習專業課程之堅實基礎。本課程之內容包含力學、熱力學、聲學、電磁學、光學及近代物理。教授者可按每週三小時、二個學期的時間設計、再參酌各系不同之需求、加強或節略某些章節。
description.en: The course is designed for the students with engineering background. The theme of this course is to encourage students to participate in the discovery of laws and wonder of nature, and to solidate the foundation for the particular courses of study for different departments. The contents of this course include mechanics, dynamics, thermodynamics, electromagnetics, optics, and foundation of modern physics, etc.. The lecturers will emphasize or abridge certain contents based on the individual needs of departments. For this course, there will be 3 credits for each of two semesters,  and 3 lecture hours per week.

description.zh: 瞭解計算機之硬体組織與資料結構等基本原理及其應用，並介紹各種程式語言特性，內容包括：1.計算機簡介：介紹計算機之演進及計算機之種類與特性，2.計算機系統簡介：介紹計算機系統的組成及軟硬体系統所含概之內容，3.資料的表示法與數字系統：介紹數系及文數字表示法，4.輸出入裝置及儲存体：介紹各種輸出入設備及資料儲存体，5.程式語言與程式設計：介紹各種程式語言結構，及撰寫之方法，6.資料結構：介紹資料在記憶体內之各種排列方法以節省記憶空間及提高存取效率，7.作業系統：介紹各種管理電腦資源的系統軟体及其作業方式，8.檔案與資料庫：介紹各種檔案的類型及資料庫之基本架構，9.資料通訊與計算機網路：介紹資料通訊之種種特性及電腦網路之結構與類別，10.人工智慧：介紹人工智慧基本概念及基本功能
description.en: This introductory course covers the fundamentals and applications of computers.Contents include:1. Introduction to computer2. Introduction to computer system3. Data representation and number system4. Input/Output and storage device5. Programming language and design 6. Data  structure7. Operating systems8. File and database systems9. Data communication and computer networks10. Artificial intelligence

name.en: Understand the basic structure of programming languages.

description.zh: 瞭解程式語言的基本結構，並以C語言為主要實習對象，其內容包含：1. 程式語言簡介：介紹各種程式語言及其特性，並對C語言之發展沿革架構及持點詳加討論，2. 資料型態：介紹C語言之資料型態及各種運算子，3. 基本輸入：介紹各種輸出入函數及輸出入實習，4. 流程控制：介紹指定指述，選擇敘述及迴圈敘述，並做實習，5. 前置處理：介紹前置處理觀念及程式實作，6. 函式：介紹主副程式及實作，7. 陣列與字串：介紹各種陣列之特性及字串與陣列之關係，並做實習，8. 結構型態：介紹結構，列舉及同位資料型態及應用實習，9. 指標：介紹指標之觀念及應用實習，10. 位元運算：介紹位元運算及應用實習，11. 檔案處理：各種檔案之介紹及檔案輸出入函數，12. 鍵盤與游標控制：介紹鍵盤、游標之控制及字元之特性，並作相關實習，13. 繪圖與音樂：介紹文字模式及繪圖模式函數，並作實習，14. C語言與物件導向：介紹C++與物件導向之關係，及物件與類別之基本定義，並作相關實習。
description.en: Understand the basic structure of programming languages. C language is used for the practice. The course includes: 1. Introduction to programming languages: introduce various programming languages as well as their properties and discuss the history, the structure and advantages of C language. 2. Data types: introduce the data types and operators of C language. 3. Basic Input and Output: introduce various input and output functions and work on their practices. 4. Processes Control: introduce assignments, select statements and loop statements and work on their practices. 5. Preprocess: introduce the concept of the preprocess and work on the programming practice. 6. Functions: introduce the main program and subroutines. 7. Array and strings: introduce the properties of various arrays as well as the relations between strings and arrays and work on their practices. 8. Structure data types: introduce structure data types and work on the practices. 9. Pointers: introduce the concept of pointe

description.zh: 科技管理有別於一般管理，主要以科技產業、科技領域、科技組織、科技人才為層面，探討各項管理技巧，管理科學的應用，其主要內容包含：1.科技管理的領域，2.科技管理模式，3.科技企業組織及管理，4.科技專案管理，5.科技行銷管理，6.科技管理的新發展。
description.en: 1.The coverage of technology management. 2.Technology management model. 3.The organization and management of technology      corporation.4.The management of technology projects. 5.The management of technology marketing. 6.The development of technology management.

description.zh: 國文，是運用本國語言文字，蘊釀於欣賞文藝作品，充實文化內涵，增進思維能力與人文素養的一門課程。本課程分為大一上學期2學分，大一下學期2學分。大一上學期的授課內容，以文學名篇為範圍；希望藉此擴建學生深入品味文學趣味的能力，鍛鍊靈活的語文敏感度，默契文學創意，甚而嘗試創作。大一下學期的授課內容，以思想名篇為範圍；希望藉此啟發學生透轍分析各家學說思想，漫步哲人的宇宙天地，跟隨哲人的心路歷程，進而念茲在茲，從容內化，共饗取之不盡用之不竭的先驗與風範。
description.en: "Chinese" is the course where we make full use of our native languages to enjoy literary works, to enrich our cultural taste, to develop our thinking and even to elevate human cultivation.This four-credit course is set for the freshman students: with 2 credits in each of the two semesters of the school year. In the first semester, the course covers important articles in literature, in the hope for the student learners to cultivate better ability to taste literary works when they have more vivid sense on the language. With fuller knowledge on what literature is about, they are expected to try creative writings. For the second semester, the course is mainly focused on the writings on thoughts. It is our expectation that throughout the reading and analysis of various great schools of philosophy, the student learners are given the opportunity to explore the huge minds of philosophers, who will thus be imitated and followed. Through the internalization, the students might benefit themse

name.en: Core Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Nomocracy

description.zh: 本課程以民主、法治課程為核心，重在強化公民的素養，增進政治體制及法律運作實務等之相關課程。
description.en: Democracy and nomocracy are the core curriculum, focusing on enhancing the quality of citizens and promoting the related courses in  the political system, the operation of the law practices and so on.

name.en: Core Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Nature

description.zh: 本課程主要是培養學生的邏輯思維能力及提升學生對自然領域學科的認識，特別規劃了生命科學概論、邏輯推理與現代科技概論等核心課程，並提供相關進階選修課程，以期同學從課程的學習中，增進學生邏輯思維能力，促進學生珍惜生命、關愛自然環境以及熱愛地球。
description.en: This course including core curricula such as the Introduction of Life Science, Logic Reasoning, and the Introduction of Modern Technology and related advanced elective courses, aims to develop students’ logic thinking and reinforce their knowledge in the field of science. This course is intended to explore students’ logic thinking, and encourage them to cherish life, protect the natural environment, and love the earth.

description.zh: 本課程希望在一學年中，能使學生對微分及積分有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、啟發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖，以建立同學未來學習工程數學及相關專業課程之數學基礎，充分達到學以致用的目的。課程內容包括：1.極限與連續，2.導數及其應用，3.不定積分與定積分，4.超越函數及其反函數，5.積分法則，6.不定型與瑕積分，7.定積分的應用，8.空間幾何與向量微積分，9.偏導數，10.重積分。
description.en: This course aims at developing comprehension of Derivation and Integral、activating capabilities of Logic Inference and Induction、enlightening confidence and independence、strengthening calculating abilities with an emphasis on its application and diagram、furnishing a sound basis for future specialty. The content includes: 1.Limits and Continuity, 2.Derivative and Application, 3.Indefinite and Definite Integral, 4.Transcendental Functions and their Inverses, 5.Techniques of Integration, 6.Indeterminate Forms and Improper Integral, 7.Application of Integration, 8.Basic Vector Analysis, 9.Partial Derivative, 10.Multiple Integration.

description.zh: 介紹經濟學基本概念及分析方法，包含供給與需求、市場均衡分析、效用與消費者選擇、生產與成本、國民所得與經濟福利、凱因斯所得理論、貨幣理論、綜合供需均衡分析、國際貿易理論。
description.en: This course introduces the basic concepts of Economics and analytical techniques.  Which includes supply and demand, marketing balance analysis, production and cost, GNP and economic welfare, international trade theories, and so on.

description.zh: 介紹會計學之基本觀念， 會計循環 - 包括分錄、過帳、試算、結算及財務報表之編製。逐一說明財務報表各個項目，最後並介紹財務報表之分析。修畢本課程之後能瞭解會計學之基本原理，會計資料處理及財務報表產生之整個過程，以及簡單之財務報表分析技術，並為未來之企業及財務相關課程打下良好基礎。
description.en: This course introduces the basic concepts of accounting.  All the necessary processes are included as well the financial report analysis.  After being taking this course, the student can understand the accounting concepts, accounting data process, generation of accounting report and techniques for analyzing the financial report.

name.en: Introduction to Industrial Engineering and Management

description.zh: 主要敘述工業管理的發展、沿革及新趨勢，內容包含：工業組織、人事管理、工廠規畫、成本分析與控制、工業設備、研究發展、生產管理、物料管理、品質管理及工業安全等，期使學生對工業工程與管理整體作業有一概括性的認識。
description.en: This course will mainly introduce the past history, development and future trend of industrial engineering and management. It concludes industrial organization, personnel management, factory planning, cost analysis and control, R&D, production management, materials management, quality management and industrial safety.

description.zh: 本校之普通物理課程專為工程科系背景之同學設計，主要的目的是鼓勵同學參與大自然運行奧秘、法則之探索，並供給爾後修習專業課程之堅實基礎。本課程之內容包含力學、熱力學、聲學、電磁學、光學及近代物理。教授者可按每週三小時、二個學期的時間設計、再參酌各系不同之需求、加強或節略某些章節。
description.en: The course is designed for the students with engineering background. The theme of this course is to encourage students to participate in the discovery of laws and wonder of nature, and to solidate the foundation for the particular courses of study for different departments. The contents of this course include mechanics, dynamics, thermodynamics, electromagnetics, optics, and foundation of modern physics, etc.. The lecturers will emphasize or abridge certain contents based on the individual needs of departments. For this course, there will be 3 credits for each of two semesters,  and 3 lecture hours per week.

For this course, there will be 3 credits for each of two semesters,  and 3 lecture hours per week.

name.zh: 自動化光學精密檢測及實習

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹自動化光學精密檢測相關技術，內容包括如下：前言，精密量測概論，機器視覺原理，二維光學檢測技術及實習，三維光學檢測技術及實習，影像處理與人工智慧技術運用，智慧型量測系統及應用，系統整合之相關技術，產業相關技術應用，及結論。
description.en: This subject is arranged to introduce the principles and techniques required in Automatic Optical Inspection (AOI). The subject includes the following subtopics: introduction to precision metrology and machine vision, the measurement principles and methods used in the 2D AOI, the measurement principles and techniques used in the 3D AOI, image processing and artificial intelligence methods used in automatic inspection, intelligent measurement systems, AOI system integration and conclusion.

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹微處理系統的介面設計。其中包括記憶體介面，一般的輸出輸入介面以及CPLD/FPGA介面。由於CPLD與FPGA大量應用在嵌入式系統中，如何利用微處理器的彈性軟體設計，搭配CPLD/FPGA的高速運算能力，將是本課程的重點。
description.en: Interfacing between microprocessor and peripheral will be discussed in this course.  The interfacing technique includes memory interface, general peripheral and CPLD/FPGA devices.  A large number of industrial applications have applied CPLD/FPGA into their design.  This course will also focus on integrating of microcontroller and CPLD/FPGA devices by taking advantages of the flexibility of microcontroller and high speed calculation capability of CPLD/FPGA devices.

name.zh: 物件導向程式設計與應用

description.zh: 1.物件導向程式設計特性介紹 2.視窗圖形界面設計 3. SQL語言的使用與資料庫連結 4.智慧型演算法 5.工程實例應用
description.en: 1.An introduction to object-oriented design 2.Windows GUI design 3.SQL and Database connection programming 4.Intelligent Algorithms 5. Applications of engineering problems

description.zh: 本課程讓學生了解國內車輛產業的背景、現況和當前所面臨的課題，同時介紹車輛產業的分野，包括其架構、職掌、功能 和任務。最後論述未來國內車輛產業的動向和國際分工。
description.en: The aims of the course are to take on comprehension for learners that the background of vehicle industry, current situation developing and the issues we have been faced. Additionally, the demarcation of vehicle industry is introduced, including the structure, responsibility, function and its mission. Finally, the future trend, international uniting cooperation for domestic vehicle industry is discussed.

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。(在職專班)
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

description.zh: 加強學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: Group Discussion. Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程的目的在於按照熱力學和原子機構的基本理論來解釋一些新發展，並以此來討論相變化的問題。內容有相變化之熱力學和擴散學理論，液相－固相及固相－固相相變化之討論。
description.en: The objective of this course to present a treatment of phase transformations in which these and other new developments could be explained in terms of the basic principles of thermodynamics and atomic mechanisms。The contents introduce thermodynamics and diffusion theories of phase transformations，and deal with liquid－solid phase transformations，solid－solid phase transformations。

description.zh: 本課程內容為介紹鋼構造建築物之基本特性，超高層鋼架及特殊空間鋼架之結構系統，使學生習得解決建築空間與結構型態之實務問題，其主要授課內容為：（1）鋼骨構架之特性，（2）於各種載重下鋼骨構材之行為，（3）鋼構架之變形能力與破壞機構，（4）超高層鋼架及特殊空間鋼架之結構系統，（5）消能裝置之特性及運用，（6）隔震、制震之現況及展望。
description.en: This course introduced the basic characteristics about steel structure, the structural systems and forms of hi-rise building and special indoor space, in order to provide students to learn the relation between architectural space and structural type, the course consists of (1)the characteristics of steel element,(2)behavior of steel element under variable loads,(3)deformation capacity and collapse mechanism of steel frame,(4)structural system of special indoor space,(5)the application and properties of energy dissipaters or mechanical dampers,(6)the view of base isolators and response control system of structures.

notes: 四建四與職二建五合開

description.zh: 本課程主要進行「永續建築環境」之相關研究議題探討與分析。於瞬息萬變之環境與極富思維空間之建築研究中並不能全然按理論或法則定律判斷，亦須依實務經驗輔以基礎理論架構予以綜合評估與分析評估。探討之內容包括但不限下面之主題：『永續建築環境規劃設計』、『永續建築環境教育』和『永續能源環境規劃設計』等相關議題間之相互依存性或相關性，藉由國內外之相關案例進行深入探討與分析，期待建立個人對現今永續建築環境之瞭解與認識。
description.en: The theme of the course is "Sustainable Architecture". It aims to provide a forum to examine and discuss solution-oriented methods for implementing sustainable development, and to stimulate more ideas and useful insights regarding architecture development within the context of sustainability. In an effort to explore and map the challenges and opportunities of sustainable development, this course aims to address the various aspects of architecture & urban development in accordance with the principles of sustainability. These themes will address issues but not limit to, architectural design, ecological and social sustainability, economic and environmental sustainability, environmentalism.

description.zh: 本課程主要在論述以建築規劃設計者之立場如何利用建築設備系統控制建築物理環境影響因子，以及其與建築物銜接介面之統合關係。本課程為第一階段之系列課程，其內容包括：1. 地球環境變遷對環境控制系統之衝擊2. 空調設備系統3. 特殊空調節能設備4. 電氣設備系統5. 設施管理6.設備更新
description.en: This course mainly discuss issues about architecture planning how a designer uses architecture equipment system to control architecture physical Environmental Impact, and its integrate relation with Building's connecting medium.This course is the first step of a series course, its content including:1. The Impact of Earth Environmental Change to Environmental Control System2. Air Conditional Equipment System  3. Special Air Conditional Energy Conservation System4. Electric equipment5. Facility Management6. Renewal of Equipment System

description.zh: 本課程主要教導學生了解各結構系統的架構及概念，與其受地震力、風力之行為。1.作用於建築物之荷重、2.結構材料性質與結構需求、3.基本應力、4.受張及受壓結構、5.桁架結構、6.樑及構架系統、7.格子樑、平版及摺板系統、8.薄膜結構、9.薄殼結構
description.en: The main purpose of this course is training students to comprehend the concepts and behaviors of each kind of structural systems. 1.Loads on Structures, 2.Structural Materials and Structural Requirements, 3.Fundamental Stress, 4.Tension and Compression Structures, 5.Truss Systems, 6.Beam and Rigid Frames, 7.Grid, Slab and Folded-Plate, 8.Membrane Structures, 9.Thin Shells

description.zh: 本課程分三年（六學期）教授，各學年課程教授內容如下：第一學年----主要在教導學生對美學基本素養、空間的體驗及空間構成演練，使具備建築設計之基本能力與知識，其主要授課要點如下：一.基本設計訓練及空間的體驗：1.設計基本原理的認識與操作。2.空間經驗的掌握與表達。二、空間的構成：1.基本元素的應用--線、版、體。2.比例、尺度、材質與構造的訓練。3.開口及光影的表現。4.空間的界定與串連。三、空間與造型：1.空間與造型的關係。2.量體與空間、造型。3.結構概念與空間、造型。四、機能與組織：1.行為模式分析。2.機能與動線安排。3.空間的組織。第二學年----主要在教導學生探討空間組織、造型與行為模式等使學生具備整合建築設計相關知識及操作之能力，其主要授課要點如下：1.在範圍上--以各種使用性質的單棟建築為主題。2.在設計內容上--進一步探討空間組織、造型、行為特性及模式。3.在實質因素上--訓練對基地實質環境的認識及掌握，並著重材料、構造、設備、結構等系統的結合。4.在實務人才的養成上--具備整合建築設計相關專業知識及操作的能力。第三學年----主要在教導學生對環境或都市之認知，並使其具備細部設計以至整體建築設計及監造之能力，以銜接未來之實
description.en: This course is organized, as a three-year's program that is arranged around a pattern of six semesters. The modular teaching structure is:1. First year - An introduction to basic design problem solving : concepts of point, line, plane, and space organization : principles of unity/variety ,order ,balance , proportion ,scale , etc.; orthographic projection and axonometrics ; pattern diagramming ; and basic design consequences of human activity. Studio introduction to architectural design problem solving; concepts of architectural aesthetic principles; value drawing techniques; model building; anthropometrics ; and human gathering and circulation patterns. Investigations of visual structures and their order , and exercises to develop ability to communicate about form and space. Explorations of two-dimensional and three-dimensional design through manipulation of the design elements in association with the design principles. Emphasis on materials , techniques , and color/shape relationshi

description.zh: 有鑒於國內的教育制度主張男女擁有平等的權利，但實際結果卻是女學生在理工科系方面成為少數族群，本課程以增進女性參與人機互動為主要目標，結合一連串的研習營教學與展示技術的引入，教導有關互動科技技術等相關應用，並透過了解性別研究的主要流派與其理論，來確認性別研究與互動設計的性質與功能，期待學生能再了解性別研究的主要理論後，能把它應用於互動設計以及創意發想上，以因應未來女性經濟力的快速掘起。
description.en: The education system of Taiwan claims that men and women are equal. The truth is that female students are only a minority of the department of the science and engineering, not to mention the percentage of the further education in this field. Based on this concept, we plan the interactive curriculum. We will go to give instruction about the interactive technology. In order to test the spot reaction and track the reaction after the exhibition when the exhibition is ongoing, we will apply Radio-frequency identification. The outdoor education and the indoor education; the two complement each other and expecting this exhibition to encourage more female students to discovery the science and have better achievements in this field.

description.zh: 車輛產業是一個不允許失效發生的產業，為了防止系統失效的發生，必須有一套嚴謹且可靠的開發流程來讓開發工程師依循。如何提供一套功能安全設計流程來讓開發工程師依循，且對於分析結果有嚴謹的確認制度是相關產業未來生存與發展之非常重要的工作，因此車輛安全技術國際標準(ISO 26262) 將成為車輛產業系統功能安全設計分析手法的主流。
description.en: The occurrence of system failure is not allowed in vehicle industry. In order to prevent it, developers must have rigorous and reliable development processes. How to provide a set of functional safety design processes to help developers to follow and a strict accreditation criterion to ensure that analysis results are consistent with requirements are very important for the related industries to survive and develop.  Consequently, ISO 26262, the international standard of road vehicles functional safety will become the main analysis techniques of a system function safety design for vehicle industry in future.

notes: 車輛所與車輛所在職專班合開

description.zh: 口語言談或書寫篇章的整段言詞構成一個意義單位，表達某種溝通意義及意圖。用詞遣字最需要的是語言運用的條理性，包括上下文高度一致以及邏輯緊密連貫。此課程將利用道地英文文章為基礎來分析英文篇章詞句中的語意架構。這種實際操作的目標在於幫助學生發展英文寫作技巧，同時也訓練思考能力。此課程可能包括以下議題： 	英語/文的合理表達方式及結構 	母語的語言/概念基模對於外語言詞表達的影響 	字彙/言詞適當性與意識型態的關係 	英文中習慣與創新的言詞模式及字彙選擇 	構成英語文溝通模式的價值與信念系統 	外語社會文化語意貼切所需之認知精確度與概念流利度
description.en: Discourse as a stretch of spoken or written language constitutes a semantic unit to convey certain communicative meanings and intentions. It demands an orderly use of language in terms of a high level of lexical cohesion as well as logical coherence. This course will employ real-world English writing as a springboard to the analysis and understanding of semantic scaffolding of a discourse. Such a practice aims to help students develop skills in English writing along with those in critical thinking. Topics to be addressed may include the following: 	The sense-making expressions and structures in English;  	The impacts of L1 linguistic/conceptual schemas on the L2 discourse; 	The lexical/discursive appropriateness in relation to ideological complexes; 	The conventional and creative discursive patterns and lexical choices in English; 	The system of values and beliefs that constitutes the English-language communication mode;  	The cognitive sophistication and conceptual fluency

description.en: This course aims at exploring knowledge bases of the English curriculum design and evaluation and putting curricular theories into practice in curriculum planning for professional development English courses. Emphases of the course will be on major issues, theoretical bases and procedures of the English curriculum planning, especially the English course design for professional fields and evaluation of the effectiveness of the designed courses.

Besides, the streamlined LCA (SLCA) will also be taught in the class.

description.en: This class will help students familiarize themselves with the trend of theoretical basis of the quality management and strengthen their ability in both theoretical research and practical application. First, the course covers basic statistics so that students will be acquainted with research methods and analysis techniques. Second, the six sigma management tools will be reviewed and the process for its implementation will also be addressed. The system- and the organization-level quality as well as the Kano Model for attractive quality will be discussed. The curriculum of this class includes the introduction of empirical models integrated with case study so that the students will be strengthened in the capabilities of real world problem solving and quality improvement. Finally, the big data opportunity, extracting insight from an immense volume, variety and velocity of data, in context, beyond what was previously possible, will be addressed. name.zh: 雲端應用與大數據實務
name.en: Cloud Computing Applications and Big Data Practices

description.zh: 雲端運算是指透過網際網路進行擴充、消費或提供IT服務，顧客可隨時取用網路資源、軟體或資料之新模式。雲端運算不是一項全新技術，而是一項應用與服務創新的概念，「簡單的說，就是把所有的軟體或資料全部丟到網際網路上處理(Services on the Internet)」。雲端運算被視為新IT時代中最有影響力的整合技術之一，而大數據分析是它主要的應用，它亦是近年來資通訊(ICT)產業重要的趨勢與創新應用，是新一代的網際網路與資料中心(Data Center)。本課程主要內容包含雲端運算基本概念、雲端運算之服務與管理策略、以及雲端應用服務與個案實例。隨著雲端運算服務的廣為使用及網際網路服務的發展，已產生大量的數據，如何處理與儲存大數據、如何從大數據中，探勘有用的知識，成為近年來熱門的研究議題。本課程內容尚包括如何處理與儲存大數據以及選擇有關大數據分析之應用服務與實例個案於課堂上簡報與研討。
description.en: Cloud computing is not a new technology, but the concept of application and service innovation. In short, cloud computing is regarded as one of the new IT era's most influential technology integration. Big data analysis is its main application. The key trends and innovative applications, as well as  the internet and a new generation of data centers (data center) will be discussed. The main contents of this course include the basic concepts of cloud computing, applications and case examples of cloud computing services and management strategy, big data applications etc.    With the widespread use of cloud computing services and the development of Internet services, huge amount of data has been generated. How to deal with the huge amount of data has become a hot research issue. This course will also include how to handle and store huge amount of data and how to carry out further exploration from big data. Big data case studies and practices will also be conducted in the class.

description.zh: 讓學生瞭解製造業與服務業行銷的觀念和趨勢。主要包括以下課題：（1）消費者行為（2）市場區隔（3）產品策略（4）行銷通路（5）網路行銷（6）促銷（7）關係行銷。

description.zh: 本課程分三年（六學期）教授，各學年課程教授內容如下：第一學年----主要在教導學生對美學基本素養、空間的體驗及空間構成演練，使具備建築設計之基本能力與知識，其主要授課要點如下：一.基本設計訓練及空間的體驗：1.設計基本原理的認識與操作。2.空間經驗的掌握與表達。二、空間的構成：1.基本元素的應用--線、版、體。2.比例、尺度、材質與構造的訓練。3.開口及光影的表現。4.空間的界定與串連。三、空間與造型：1.空間與造型的關係。2.量體與空間、造型。3.結構概念與空間、造型。四、機能與組織：1.行為模式分析。2.機能與動線安排。3.空間的組織。第二學年----主要在教導學生探討空間組織、造型與行為模式等使學生具備整合建築設計相關知識及操作之能力，其主要授課要點如下：1.在範圍上--以各種使用性質的單棟建築為主題。2.在設計內容上--進一步探討空間組織、造型、行為特性及模式。3.在實質因素上--訓練對基地實質環境的認識及掌握，並著重材料、構造、設備、結構等系統的結合。4.在實務人才的養成上--具備整合建築設計相關專業知識及操作的能力。第三學年----主要在教導學生對環境或都市之認知，並使其具備細部設計以至整體建築設計及監造之能力，以銜接未來之實
description.en: This course is organized, as a three-year's program that is arranged around a pattern of six semesters. The modular teaching structure is:1. First year - An introduction to basic design problem solving : concepts of point, line, plane, and space organization : principles of unity/variety ,order ,balance , proportion ,scale , etc.; orthographic projection and axonometrics ; pattern diagramming ; and basic design consequences of human activity. Studio introduction to architectural design problem solving; concepts of architectural aesthetic principles; value drawing techniques; model building; anthropometrics ; and human gathering and circulation patterns. Investigations of visual structures and their order , and exercises to develop ability to communicate about form and space. Explorations of two-dimensional and three-dimensional design through manipulation of the design elements in association with the design principles. Emphasis on materials , techniques , and color/shape relationshi

notes: 104入學非建築背景需修讀建築圖學與施工圖及格

description.zh: 本課程主在讓學生瞭解服務業行銷，強調優質服務、服務品質和顧客滿意。 內容:服務業概論、服務傳送系統、服務模式、服務品質、生產力和品質改善、定價、服務業的經營策略、個案討論。
description.en: Services marketing is to discuss How to manage service and satisfy customers. The content of the course: service concept, the service delivery system , service model, productivity and quality improvement, pricing, service quality, service strategy, customer satisfaction and case study.

description.zh: 設計與生活是自古以來就相生相隨的一項行為，生活型態的變化，對生活器具的要求也就不同。故本課程主要在探討研究設計行為與生活型態之關係，進而提供新思維作為設計行為之參考。
description.en: Design is a part of human life. Demands in design changes withlifestyle. This course focuses on general review of ifestyle research that is practically constructive in the process of product planning and design.。

description.zh: 產品設計專案包含研究與設計。設計專案透過工業設計的理論、方法及程序，以研究的手段形成設計決策，或以實證的方式將研究成果應用於設計實務。設計專案之設計成果必須建立在相關的研究基礎上。
description.en: This course is directed toward an approved product design project withresearch and design completed under supervision of the director. Theory andpractice in research and development dealing with the design project isreviewed in the study. Projects must represent a meaningful contribution tothe field of design base on supportive research.

description.zh: 科技始終來自於人性，不論是家具、室內或產品設計目的都是服務人群，因而應該以人為中心來考量生活形態、人因、心理認知、文化等層面對設計的影響。本課程旨在闡明此一理念，課程包括：以使用者為中心的設計方法及步驟，並輔以實例說明及個案研討。
description.en: "Technology always comes from humanity."  The purpose of interior, furniture or product is to serve people.  Therefore, their design should reflect the user's life style, human factors, mental cognitions and cultural differences.  This course aims to explore human-centered design.  First, the definition and significance of human-centered design will be discussed.  The methods and procedures of human-centered design in the field of design will also be studied.  Finally, some examples and case studies will be explored.

notes: 創新所與創新所在職專班合開/設計603

description.zh: 經由對環境問題的一般瞭解，研究現有之綠色設計政策、綠色設計管理及綠色生命週期設計。分析研究可行的方案來落實reduce, reuse 及 recycle （3R）三原則於產品設計程序之中。
description.en: A general review of environment issues and their problems followed by studies on green design policy, green design management, life-cycle design. Studies of exploring guidelines that lead to implementation of principles of reduce, reuse and recycle in process of product design.

description.zh: 本課程將從石油談起，介紹煉油工業主要產品、生產製程及技術，並將介紹供應石化產業基本原料的輕油裂解工場、媒組工場以及其衍生之各種烯烴與芳香烴工業。隨著環保意識高漲，石油工業發展面臨，工安、環保、節能減碳、水資源、化石能源永續性發展等嚴峻挑戰以及面對產業轉型之石化高值化，也是本課程之目標。
description.en: Topics covered: 1. Characteristics of crude, petroleum product and its manufacture.2. Processes technology in petroleum refining & petrochemical manufacture 3. Petrochemicals and its application4. Overview of Taiwan petrochemical industry 5. Industrial safety, environmental concern, energy conservation and sustainability issue in regard to fossil fuel6. High value added & rejuvenation of Taiwan petrochemical industry

description.zh: 為追求「永續發展與人本健康」之目的，使既有與新建的居住環境，配合我國「室內空氣品質管理法」規範下運作，提昇民眾居住環境健康品質效益，針對病態建築之環境問題，其涵蓋醫療、法律、建築、化學、生物等領域，綜合診斷以進行改善。本課程為第一階段之系列課程，其內容包括： 一.健康環境概念：說明何謂「病態建築」，探討室內空氣與健康之關係。 二.建築物污染源：探討來自各建築材料的化學物質逸散及其對人體健康之影響，並提出室內污染物質濃度減低對策。 三.生物性污染源：探討黴菌、蹣、白蟻及寵物等帶來的室內空氣污染。 四.診斷技術：說明室內空氣品質診斷方法及病態建築改善之專業技術，配合案例介紹探討新、舊建築物室內環境品質的設計預防、診斷改善技術。
description.en: The main goal of this class is to pursue sustainable development and human health. In order to enhance the quality of residential and living environment in both existing and new-build dwellings, the course will cover important principles and topics in sick building environment, including medical, regulation, and architecture, chemical and biological. Specific contents include: (1)Conception of healthy environment: To explain the "sick building" and explore the association between indoor air and health.(2)Pollution source from buildings: To investigate the chemicals emission from building materials and their effect on human health, and get the countermeasures on reduce the indoor pollutants.(3)Pollution source from Biological: To investigate the indoor air pollution that cause by the mold, mites, termites, and pets.(4)Diagnostic techniques: To improved indoor air quality and sick building by diagnostic methods, with the case studies to prevent indoor environmental quality on new and old

notes: 與建都所、設計博班合併開課

name.zh: 創新創業智財法律專題研究
name.en: Innovation, Entrepreneurship and Intellectual Property Law

description.zh: 本課程呼應技職再造的創新創業趨勢，以具體個案討論為中心，讓同學有機會運用所學、解決實際的法律問題。適合對如何透過智財法律推動知識經濟、創新創業有興趣的同學。同學可以透過本課程，進一步了解創新創業現實中可能面臨的問題、並練習提供解決策略。
description.en: This course will focus on the intellectual property legal issues regarding innovation and entrepreneurship by drawing real cases for analysis and discussion. Students will have opportunities to further understand the legal practice in IP area by taking part in solving real cases with the help of the course tutor. It is recommended for those who are equipped with a general understanding of IP laws or are strongly interested in this subject.

All Freshman students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.

description.zh: 本課程提供學生對於專案管理之主要原則與專案排程實務，並學習運用專案排程管理軟體工具。本課程探討專案管理與排程實務課題，包括專案之需求、經理、工作團隊、溝通、排程管理、預算、成本控制等，並學習專案排程管理軟體工具。
description.en: The course objective is to introduce students about key principles of project management and the use of project scheduling software.This course discusses the factors necessary for the successful project management.  Topics include project management concepts, needs identification, the project manager, teams, project organizations, project communications, project planning, scheduling, control and associated costs.  Project management software tools will be an integral part of the course.

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

name.zh: 設計研析與創作實務專題(三)
name.en: Topics on Design Research and Design Practice(III)

description.zh: 透過專題討論方式，使學生對設計研究及創作實務相關議題及趨勢有更深入的瞭解。專題內容主要包括1.文化生活設計、2.設計美學、3. 消費文化與設計策略、4.設計行為與創造力、5.以及其他學生有興趣研究的設計研析與實務創作主題。
description.en: To make students have a better understanding on various topics regarding the issues and trends of design research and design practice. Topics are mainly as follows: 1. Cultural Life Design, 2. Design Aesthetics, 3.Consumption Culture and Design Strategy, 4. Design Behavior and Creativity, 5. Other topics that students are interested in their related researches.

notes: 創新所與創新所在職專班合開/設計603

description.zh: 1.數位科技時代在摩爾定律的預估下，地球上人類生活經濟的變化，已非從工業經濟時代的經營觀念與法則所能因應。2.創新設計已成為了企業因變應變的主要法則，美國設計管理協會副主席GE公司業務副總裁Beth Comstock於2011國際美國設計管理協會年會 (DMI)中曾提出，「在21世紀企業經營重點在創新設計，創新設計的重點是如何有效應用於企業經營」。美國商業週刊2005/7月封面故事標題是「明日的商學院可能被設計學院取代」美國哈佛大學管理論壇專文曾提出未來企業經營主管將不只要在經管團隊中聘請設計師，而本身應該成為一個設計師。3.本課程是今日數位科技時代，企業應用創新設計思維進行創新的核心課程，並以3M前新產品開發主管Gerard H. Gaynor 「Innovation by Design」及Roger Martin的「The Design of Business」為參考課本輔以美國設計管理協會出版(DMI)的國際創新設計成功範例教學。本課程將以理論，實例與實務工作營方式進行。
description.en: As the forecasting of Moor's law, In today's rapid progressing technology and economic Era, The traditional rule of business management and product development, will no longer be effective."What business needs now is design, What design needs now, is making it about business"  Beth Comstock. SVP. GE. and Co-Chair. DMI. Conference 2011.The Vice Chair of American Design Management Institute. The cover story of Business Week,2005 5/31 " B school today, tomorrow will be D school", The Business Review of Harvard University  "The CEO today should be a designer, not just to hire them" Innovation and the utilization of design thinking, will play the main role, In the future business development,This curriculum is the core course of innovative design thinking, for business manager and product and service innovator.The main reference material of the course are "Innovation by Design" Gerard H, Gaynor, 3M former Head of Product Development, and "The Design of Business" by Roger Martin, and the

notes: 四設三、四設四、創新所、創新所在職專班合開

description.zh: 本課程將以智慧財產局頒布之「專利審查基準」為藍本，依「先程序後實體」原則先就「程序審查」部分介紹專利申請之程式，再就專利申請之「實體審查」部分依序說明專利說明書暨圖式之構成、可專利類型、產業利用性、新穎性、進步性等專利要件，先申請原則、發明單一性、優先權、說明書及圖式之修正、分割申請及改請申請，以及專利權期間延長。
description.en: This course is to introduce the formality examination and the substantive examination based upon the "Patent Examination Guideline" issued by the TIPO, including the formality of the patent application, and the, utility, novelty, inventive steps, first-to-file, priority claim, amendment, divisional application, and the extension of patent term and so on.

name.en: Special Issues of Computer-Aided Architectural Design (I)

description.zh: 本課程主要目標包括以下各方面：1.介紹與瞭解電腦繪圖在環境規劃設計上的應用方法與理論。2.學會建築設計作品的首頁建構與網路基本應用的操作。3.學習建築設計影像處理技術。授課內容主題包括：電腦輔助建築繪圖與網路應用表現，個人Homepage設計，設計作品網頁表現，建築專業影像處理與環境影像改造，平面動態影像處理技術，建築專業輔助繪圖設計軟體的介紹應用。
description.en: The goal of this class:1.	We introduce theory of computer-aided architectural design and we apply the method to environmental planning & design.2.	We learn how to create homepage of architectural design in www.3.	We learn the image process analysis in architectural environment.The contents of this class is included about: the presentation of computer-aided architectural design and application in www, personal homepage design and personal design work's presentation, professional image process analysis in architectural environment, animation of 2D image process and application, introduction and application of professional soft of computer-a

description.zh: 本課程採用分組教學，以1：5的師生比例就教師之專長指導學生在建築實務工作之各領域進行資料搜集，現場觀摩，對特定之課題提出報告，訓練學生深入的接觸並膫解實際的工作，以培養學生發掘問題，解決問題之執業能力。課程中間之暑假學生必須至事務所或工地現場實習，成果列為成績之一部分。
description.en: There are teaching groups for this course, each teacher by his particular research field direct five students in special topics on Architecture practice for information collecting, site studying, and report writing, The purpose is training students to come into conduct with reality Architecture working. Then, footer students professional ability to find problems, and resolve there problems in working field.On summer vocation period, students who take this course should do practice teaching in Architecture in Architecture office or working site, and the student performance for practice teaching will reueal to final grade.

description.zh: 本課程介紹目前各種材料的結構.性質及功能,並且就各種工程材料如金屬.高分子.陶瓷材料的製程加以討論.1. 材料科學及工程緒論.2. 原子結構及鍵結.3. 結晶構造及晶體幾何學.4. 凝固程序及結晶缺陷.5. 材料之機械性質.6. 金屬材料.7. 高分子材料.8. 陶瓷材料.9. 腐蝕.
description.en: This course is designated to acquaint the student with the strictures, properties and performances of materials. It contains the following topics:1. introduction to materials sciences and engineering.2. atomic structures and bonding.3. crystal structures and crystal geometry.4. solidification and crystalline imperfections.5. mechanical properties of materials.6. metals.7. polymers.8. ceramics.9. corrosion.

description.zh: 本課程分為兩部分（上學期土地利用法規、下學期不動產投資法規），上學期旨在介紹與土地開發及利用有關之上位法規，包括法規基本架構、國土計畫體系、區域計畫體系、都市計畫體系、土地開發體系及都市更新體系等相關法規外，並輔以實際案例探討，以加強同學對土地利用法規之認識與應用，並有助要準備建築師專技高考及不動產相關考試(地政士、不動產經紀人、不動產估價師)之同學應考並取得專業證照。
description.en: The course is divided into two parts (the term land use regulations, under the term real estate investment regulation), the term is intended to introduce and land development and use of relevant laws and regulations of the host, including regulatory basic architecture, land planning system, the regional planning system, outside the urban planning system, land development and urban renewal system and other system-related laws and regulations, supplemented by practical examples discussed in order to strengthen the students understanding of the land use regulations and applications, and help to prepare architect designed and Real Estate related technical college entrance exam (Lands disabilities, real estate agents, real estate appraisers) of the students sit and obtain professional licenses.

description.zh: 論述電磁干擾之物理模式與耦合機制。探討各種抗干擾之電磁相容設計實務，其中包括：接地、濾波、瞬態抑制與保護電路、屏蔽、信號互連、積體電路應用防止雜訊措施、印刷電路板抗干擾佈局設計、靜電放電保護等。介紹電磁干擾標準與量測方法。
description.en: Discuss the physical model of electromagnetic interference (EMI) and coupling mechanism. Deal with a variety of design methods for electromagnetic compatibility (EMC) which includes : Grounding, Filtering, Transient suppression and protection, Shielding, Signal interconnection, Prevents noise in IC applications, PCB layout design rules against interference, Electrostatic discharge (ESD) protection, etc. Introduce the EMI standards and measurement techniques.

description.zh: 1.微算機系統架構介紹，2.輸出入埠設計及程式控制，3.輸出入埠應用(鍵盤介面、LED顯示介面)，4.A/D、D/A介面設計，5.PC介面(PIO及SIO)設計，6.單晶片之設計與應用，7.設計微電腦硬體結構。。
description.en: 1.Introduction to microcomputer system architectrue2.I/O port design and programming control3.Applications of I/O ports: Keyboard, LED ...4.A/D, D/A interfacing design5.PC interfacing (PIO and SIO) design6.Design and application of a Single-chip system7.Hardwared design of microcomputer system

description.zh: 專題報告專題演講 研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study.Seminar.Group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程主要是教導學生在熱流學領域上的基本知識，課程內容主要包括: 1. 熱力特性簡介， 2. 熱力學基本定律， 3. 基本冷凍空調循環， 4. 流體特性簡介， 5. 柏努利方程式， 6. 管內與管外流， 7. 穩態與暫態熱傳分析， 8. 散熱片之熱傳分析， 9. 強制對流分析， 10. 自然對流分析， 11. 具相變化的熱對流: 凝結與沸騰。
description.en: This course is to teach students the basic knowledge of thermo-fluid sciences. The main content includes: 1. Introduction to thermodynamic properties, 2. Basic laws of thermodynamics, 3. Fundamentals of Refrigerating and air-conditioning cycles, 4. Introduction of fluid properties, 5. Bernoulli equation, 6. Internal and external flows, 7. Steady and transient heat conduction analysis, 8. Heat transfer from extended surfaces, 9. Forced convection, 10. Natural convection, 11. Heat transfer with phase change: boiling and condensation.

description.zh: 實驗是進行科學與工程研究不可或缺的工具，實驗方法的設計與實驗數據的分析更是決定實驗結果品質優劣的關鍵，本課程將介紹實驗過程所必須具備的各項知識，以數據的量測與分析為開始，並介紹量測各類物理量的感測元件，如壓力、溫度、流量及聲波等，以建立學生具備實驗量測的基礎。課程主要內容包含有基本量測、量測標準、量測單位、訊號讀取、資料簡報、數據的準確性與變異性、類比訊號量測、數位訊號量測、系統響應、感測器。
description.en: Introduction of Experiment and Measurement MethodExperiment is the essential tool for the research of science and engineering. The design of experiment and the analysis of data are the keys of the high quality of experiment. The course will introduce the materials of experiment and measurement. The procedures of measurement and the analysis method of data will be detailed investigated. And then the sensors to measure the interested physical parameters of pressure, temperature, flow rate and acoustic will be introduced. The technology of measurement and analysis of experiment will be built up in the course. The contents of the course are basic measurement, standards of measurement, dimension of measurement, access data, data presentation, accuracy and uncertainty of data, analog signal measurement, digital signal measurement, system response, and sensors.

description.zh: 策略管理主要是幫助製造業與服務業高階管理者作決策。一般而言，這門課程主要協助學員們具有策略思維與整合能力。學員可在策略管理學習過程活學活用，更能融合所學應用於管理決策中。此門課也採用適當的製造業與服務業個案研討來幫助學員學習、研讀與熟悉策略管理的運作，以達成此門課的目標。授課主題包括研討策略管理的本質與整體架構，瞭解組織所處環境 ， 分析外部環境之時機和危機， 剖析內部組織之優劣勢 ， 探討企業不同層次之應對策略，整合策略的執行與治理等。
description.en: Strategic management deals with the decision making in manufacturing and service industry at the top management level. Generally, this course provides students with strategic thinking and knowledge integration. With case studies in manufacturing and service industry, this course also helps students learn, study, and understand the process of strategic management well to achieve the goals of the course. Topics in this course include the essence and whole framework of strategic management, in what circumstances an organization has been, analyses on the opportunities and threats of external environment, the strengths and weaknesses of internal organization, application strategies of companies at different levels, implantation on integration strategies and so forth.

description.zh: 策略管理主要是幫助製造業與服務業高階管理者作決策。一般而言，這門課程主要協助學員們具有策略思維與整合能力。學員可在策略管理學習過程活學活用，更能融合所學應用於管理決策中。此門課也採用適當的製造業與服務業個案研討來幫助學員學習、研讀與熟悉策略管理的運作，以達成此門課的目標。授課主題包括研討策略管理的本質與整體架構，瞭解組織所處環境 ， 分析外部環境之時機和危機， 剖析內部組織之優劣勢 ， 探討企業不同層次之應對策略，整合策略的執行與治理等。

Generally, this course provides students with strategic thinking and knowledge integration. With case studies in manufacturing and service industry, this course also helps students learn, study, and understand the process of strategic management well to achieve the goals of the course. Topics in this course include the essence and whole framework of strategic management, in what circumstances an organization has been, analyses on the opportunities and threats of external environment, the strengths and weaknesses of internal organization, application strategies of companies at different levels, implantation on integration strategies and so forth.

name.en: Interactive Installation and Performing Arts Technology

description.zh: 本課程介紹整合即時影像、即時音訊、實體裝置、及相關表演科技（如燈光控制、各類感應器應用等）之技術與應用實務，並藉由圖形化、物件導向程式設計系統，引導未有程式設計經驗的視覺設計者或輔助已有程式設計能力者，以更有效率的方式進行相關互動系統設計，藉以達成互動裝置、表演科技、與表演藝術之整合。
description.en: This course introduces the technology that help integrates real-time video, audio, installations, and associated performance arts technology (such as lighting control, the application of various types of sensors, etc.) into performing arts. Through a graphical, object-oriented programming system, the course is intended to help visual designers with no programming experiences or to assist experienced programmers to efficiently design the interactive systems that combine interactive installations, performance arts technology, and performing arts itself as a whole.

description.zh: 提供本校四技學生在本行以外，對其他領域的認識，以彌補其只鑽研專業課程的偏頗，訓練學生整合知識，使不致在知識爆炸的時代中迷失，促進各種專材的溝通，培養共識；培育人文素養，啟發人文關懷，使具有完整的人生觀。
description.en: This course offers a good opportunity for four-year college students in this university to have an easier access to a completely different field of knowledge, in the hope that  students can add their individual professional knowledge and broaden their minds. The students will be furnished with integrated knowledge, discovering a better way towards professional communication, developing more common sense and never losing themselves in this information-explosive age. With a solid basis on humanity and liberal ideology, they are sure to find a more complete picture of human life.

description.zh: 介紹醫學美容之基本概念，並了解各式醫學美容治療項目，使學生了解藥物的基本概念，且了解不同藥物之功能與能量代謝之原理。
description.en: Introduction of basic principals of cosmetic medicine, including iontophoresis, sonophoresis, LASER therapy, skin peeler, etc. In addition, the students will understand the basic principles of cosmetic medicine.

description.zh: 介紹相關生物技術應用於美容化妝品的現況，包括美容化妝品常用的生化活性成份種類、作用、其萃取技術及相關技術的整合，讓學生對美容生技產業之現況與前景有基本的認識，進而提升其職能的廣度及興趣。
description.en: This course will offer a thorough introduction to beauty biotechnology and it’s current status. This newly updated text provides a solid grounding in core biotechnology concepts, as well as information on cutting-edge science and technology and their applications in real-world cosmetics industry. The students will fully study the concepts and understand the current status of the beauty biotechnology.

description.zh: 本課程在介紹及闡述化學原理及物質之性質，著重於現代化學理論及概念之導入。內容包括氣體、計量化學、原子結構、化學鍵、物質狀態、能量轉換、酸鹼理論、氧化還原反應、金屬及非金屬元素、核化學。
description.en: Introduction to the principles of chemistry and properties of matter, which are explained in terms of modern chemical theory with emphasis on conceptual problems. Individual topics include gas, stoichiometry, atomic structure, chemical bonding, and the states of matter, energy relation, acid-base theory and oxidation-reduction reactions, the chemistry of metallic and nonmetallic elements, nuclear chemistry.

description.zh: 本課程講解有關生產設備投資低，雖量少，但附加價值高之精細化學品，如各種界面活性劑，添加劑，促進劑，催化劑，助劑，香料，顏料，醫藥等。並引例介紹這些化學品製程，用途，運用原理，國內外特用化學品之現況與發展。
description.en: An introductory course focuses on chemicals which are sold at high prices in relatively limited volumes. The scope of fine chemicals includes surfactants, plastic additives, catalysts, pesticides, flavors & fragrances, dyes & pigments, bulk medicinals, etc.  Topics concerning about the manufacturing processes, application principles and recent developments of fine chemicals are also discusses in this course.

description.zh: 本課程介紹自然科學的起源、近代自然科學的誕生與發展。各領域含物理學、化學、生物學、天文學、數學等，並介紹各項科學技術。
description.en: This is an introductory course concerning about the origin of nature science, the genesis and developments of the modern physics science.  The topics of physics science are physics, chemistry, biology, astronomy, and mathematics.  The contents and characteristic of various technology are also discussed in this course.

description.zh: 本課程在透過研討，讓學生瞭解科技管理觀念和趨勢。主要包括以下課題：（1）創新與研發管理（2）科技政策（3）技術預測（4）技術策略管理（5）技術開發與移轉（6）技術規劃與評估。
description.en: The course teaches the student Technology Management concepts and trend . The topics will be covered: (1) innovation and R&D management; (2) technology policy; (3) technology forecasting ; (4) technology strategy management ; (5) technology development and transfer; (6) technology planning and measurement.

description.zh: 讓學生瞭解行銷的觀念和趨勢。主要包括以下課題：（1）消費者行為（2）市場區隔（3）產品策略（4）行銷通路（5）網路行銷（6）促銷（6）關係行銷。
description.en: The course teaches the student marketing concepts and trends. The topics will be covered: (1) consumer behavior, (2) marketing segmentation, (3) product strategy, (4) marketing channels, (5) online marketing, (6) relationship marketing.

description.zh: 本課程是要讓學生對微生物領域有基本的認識，內容包含微生物的細胞結構與功能；生理與代謝；基因調控與遺傳；分類與演化；致病性微生物及其致病機轉；同時亦扼要的介紹微生物在生物技術領域的應用。
description.en: The lectures describe the basic biology of microbial life. The course covers bacterial cell structure and function, metabolism and physiology, gene regulation and genetics, phylogeny and evolution, microbial diseases and pathogenic mechanisms, as well as applied topics in biotechnology.

description.zh: 本課程以培養學生尊重與欣賞不同族群、不同時空、不同價值觀所產生的音樂而設。藉由對音樂元素、本質的認知及介紹，欣賞各時期作曲家之代表作品，培養西方音樂的基本常識，建立音樂欣賞的專業態度。教學目標：1.提高學生音樂欣賞的素養，充實其音樂生活的內涵，2.激發學生對音樂的興趣，培育愛樂人口，增進社會祥和的原動力，3.介紹古今中外音樂名家名作，啟發學生對音樂創作的認知與敬重，4.建立學生對古典音樂、民族音樂、應用音樂及通俗音樂等不同類型音樂的正確認知與包容力，培養世界性的音樂觀。授課內容：1.概論, 2.歌樂, 3.器樂, 4.儀式音樂, 5.舞蹈音樂, 6.戲劇音樂。
description.en: This course aims to cultivate students' ability to appreciate music of different ethnic groups, different time and place, different value systems. Through the introduction of basic music elements as well as the appreciation of the masterpieces of various composers, it is hoped that students will build up basic music knowledge about music and enhance professional music appreciation potentiality in music. The goals include: 1. Elevating students' capability in music appreciation 2. Inspiring students' interest in music with a view to improving our society into a harmonious world. 3. Introducing domestic and international famous composers' pieces 4. Touring of various forms of music: classical, ethnic, applied and popular music. Contents of this course include: 1.Introduction 2. Vocal music 3. Instrumental music 4. Ritual music 5. Dance music 6. Theatre music
